page.title: 13GAMES PLAYED IN LOSSIEMOUTH.
page.content: We play many different games at school and at home.Here are some of the most popular."HIDE AND SEEK",in which there are several "Hiders" and one "Seeker",who will close his eyes and count to 100 or 200.While he is counting,the "Hiders"run and hide in various ingenious places.When the "Seeker"has finished counting,he goesin search of the"Hiders".The "Hider" tries to reach the "DEN"before the "Seeker" can catch him.The person who is caught first is the next "Seeker".{"CATCH AND HELP"}is another popular game.One person is "IT"and he tries to catch the other players.When a player is caught he then has to help to catch other players.The game ends when everyone os caught.
